INSERT ALL
INTO PET_TBL ( u_member_id, p_name, p_gender, p_type, p_weight, p_size, p_birth, p_kind, p_neutered ) VALUES ( #{p.u_member_id}, #{p.pet_name}, #{p.pet_gender}, #{p.pet_type}, #{p.pet_kg, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{p.pet_size}, #{p.pet_birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{p.pet_kind}, #{p.pet_neutered} ) SELECT 1 FROM dual
